ISSUE.TITLE: Wordpress xjoin
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm trying to join two wordpress tables unsuccesfully with this xjoin query: /xjoin?_join=pl.wp_posts,_j,pr.wp_postmeta&_on1=(pl.ID,eq,pr.post_id)&_fields=pl.ID,pr.post_id but I keep getting error 404, any hint? This should be equal to SQL join: SELECT pl.ID, pr.post_id FROM wp_posts as pl JOIN wp_postmeta as pr ON pl.ID = pr.post_id

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: refactor(api): exclude email prop from user update where it's not necessary

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #65 from nocodb/feat/workspace-improvements Feat: workspace improvements
